manifest.___NOTE___0: You may remove all the ___NOTE___ elements, they are just to remind the designer

identification.___NOTE___1: You must set the serviceEndpoint to where your agent lives.
identification.___NOTE___2: synopsis is used for short, voiced description of capabilities.

capabilities.___NOTE___3: Make 5 to 10 relevant words or phrases. Used for function discovery.
capabilities.___NOTE___4: Make 5 to 10 relevant sentences. Used for function discovery.
descriptions: Pick up and drop off services
